revised_title: Homology of Brain Structures and Cancer Research Update
tldr: The author discusses their research on the mesial stria and fasciola cinerea in the brain, as well as an update on cancer research, including attempts to cultivate parasitic protozoa from malignant tumors and infection experiments with culture media. The author also mentions a note on the treatment of cancer, communicated by Sir James Paget, F.R.S.
